name: phase-1-code-challenge-3
description: Flatdango is a web application that allows users to purchase movie tickets from Flatiron Movie Theater. This application fetches movie data from a local server running JSON DB server and displays the movie details on the frontend. The user can select a movie from the menu and buy a ticket. The number of available tickets is displayed and decreases when the user buys a ticket.
author: Senior Dev Dominic Juma
